程序包com.android.widget的分层结构

程序包分层结构:
  • 所有程序包

类分层结构

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.android.widget.Adapter.ViewHolder
    • com.android.widget.BannerAdapter.ViewHolder
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter (implements android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter)
      • com.android.widget.Adapter<T,VH>
    • android.support.v4.view.PagerAdapter
      • com.android.widget.BannerAdapter<T>
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<VH>
      • com.android.widget.RecyclerAdapter<T,VH>
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.ItemDecoration
      • com.android.widget.DividerItemDecoration
      • com.android.widget.SpaceItemDecoration
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.LayoutManager
      • android.support.v7.widget.LinearLayoutManager (implements android.support.v7.widget.helper.ItemTouchHelper.ViewDropHandler, android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.SmoothScroller.ScrollVectorProvider)
        • android.support.v7.widget.GridLayoutManager
          • com.android.widget.MeasureGridLayoutManager
        • com.android.widget.MeasureLinearLayoutManager
      • android.support.v7.widget.StaggeredGridLayoutManager (implements android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.SmoothScroller.ScrollVectorProvider)
        • com.android.widget.MeasureStaggeredGridLayoutManager
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder
      • com.android.widget.RecyclerAdapter.ViewHolder
    • com.android.widget.SwipeMenuAdapter (implements com.android.view.SwipeMenuView.OnSwipeItemClickListener, android.widget.WrapperListAdapter)
    • android.view.View (implements android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback)
      • android.view.ViewGroup (implements android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent)
        • android.widget.FrameLayout
          • com.android.widget.BrushRequestLayout
          • android.widget.ScrollView
            • com.android.widget.RecyclerViewScrollView
          • com.android.widget.SwipeMenuLayout
          • com.android.widget.SwipeRequestLayout
        • android.widget.LinearLayout
          • com.android.widget.IcsLinearLayout

接口分层结构

  • com.android.widget.Adapter.OnItemClickListener<T>
  • com.android.widget.Adapter.OnItemFocusChangeListener<T>
  • com.android.widget.BannerAdapter.OnMeasureConvertViewListener
  • com.android.widget.BrushRequestLayout.OnBrushLoadListener
  • com.android.widget.BrushRequestLayout.OnBrushRefreshListener
  • com.android.widget.RecyclerAdapter.OnItemClickListener<T>
  • com.android.widget.RecyclerAdapter.OnItemFocusChangeListener<T>
  • com.android.widget.SwipeRequestLayout.OnSwipeLoadListener
  • com.android.widget.SwipeRequestLayout.OnSwipeRefreshListener
